entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
